Article.Abstract: The CD3 epsilon gamma heterodimer is essential for expression and function of the T cell receptor. The crystal structure of the human CD3 epsilon gamma heterodimer is described to 2.1-A resolution complexed with OKT3, a therapeutic mAb that not only activates and tolerizes mature T cells but also induces regulatory T cells. The mode of CD3 epsilon gamma dimerization provides a general structural basis for CD3 assembly and maps candidate T cell antigen receptor docking sites, including a duplicated linear region rich in acidic residues that is unique to human CD3 epsilon. OKT3 binds to an atypically small area of CD3 epsilon and has a low affinity for the isolated CD3 epsilon gamma heterodimer. The structure of the OKT3/CD3 epsilon gamma complex has implications for T cell signaling and therapeutic design.
Article.ArticleTitle: Crystal structure of the human T cell receptor CD3 epsilon gamma heterodimer complexed to the therapeutic mAb OKT3.
Article.Affiliations: Department of Microbiology and Immunology, University of Melbourne, Parkville, Victoria 3010, Australia.
Article.ArticleMeshHeadingsList: Amino Acid Sequence; Animals; CD3 Complex(chemistry; immunology; metabolism); Crystallization; Dimerization; Humans; Mice; Molecular Sequence Data; Muromonab-CD3(chemistry; immunology; metabolism); Protein Binding; Protein Structure, Tertiary; Surface Plasmon Resonance

Journal.Title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
Journal.MedlineTa: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A

Epitope.EpitopeName: OKT3 Fab epitope on T-cell receptor CD3 epsilon chain

Immunization.ImmunizationComments: BALB/c or CAF<sub>1</sub> mice were immunized with E rosette-purified peripheral T cells in PBS at 14-day intervals. Immunization is described in Kung et al., Science. 1979 206:347 [PMID: 314668].

AssayInformation.AssayComments: The kinetic constants of the epitope-specific Fab in complex with a single chain construct of gamma and epsilon chains of the CD3 molecule were determined by SPR.

Immunization.ImmunizationComments: BALB/c or CAF<sub>1</sub> mice were immunized with E rosette-purified peripheral T cells in PBS at 14-day intervals. Immunization is described in Kung et al., Science. 1979 206:347 [PMID: 314668].

AssayInformation.AssayComments: The kinetic constants of the epitope-specific mAb in complex with a single chain construct of gamma and epsilon chains of the CD3 molecule were determined by SPR.

BCell.LocationOfData: Figures 1, 4, Table 1, Supporting Table 2 and PDB 1SY6

Immunization.ImmunizationComments: BALB/c or CAF<sub>1</sub> mice were immunized with E rosette-purified peripheral T cells in PBS at 14-day intervals. Immunization is described in Kung et al., Science. 1979 206:347 [PMID: 314668].

AssayInformation.AssayComments: The crystal structure of the epitope-specific Fab in complex with a single chain construct of gamma and epsilon chains of the CD3 molecule was determined.

ThreeDimensionalStructureOfComplex.Comments: The light chain interacts exclusively with the F–G loop of the antigen, whereas the heavy chain contacts the three discontinuous regions of CD3.

Immunization.ImmunizationComments: BALB/c or CAF<sub>1</sub> mice were immunized with E rosette-purified peripheral T cells in PBS at 14-day intervals. Immunization is described in Kung et al., Science. 1979 206:347 [PMID: 314668].

AssayInformation.AssayComments: The affinity of the epitope-specific mAb in complex with a single chain construct of gamma and epsilon chains of the CD3 molecule was determined by SPR. The measurement at equilibrium was 680 nM, while the calculated affinity from the kinetic constants was 639 nM.

Immunization.ImmunizationComments: BALB/c or CAF<sub>1</sub> mice were immunized with E rosette-purified peripheral T cells in PBS at 14-day intervals. Immunization is described in Kung et al., Science. 1979 206:347 [PMID: 314668].

AssayInformation.AssayComments: The affinity of the epitope-specific Fab in complex with a single chain construct of gamma and epsilon chains of the CD3 molecule was determined by SPR. The measurement at equilibrium was 2.63 µM, while the calculated affinity from the kinetic constants was 2.73 µM.

Immunization.ImmunizationComments: BALB/c or CAF<sub>1</sub> mice were immunized with E rosette-purified peripheral T cells in PBS at 14-day intervals. Immunization is described in Kung et al., Science. 1979 206:347 [PMID: 314668].

AssayInformation.AssayComments: The kinetic constants of the epitope-specific mAb in complex with a single chain construct of gamma and epsilon chains of the CD3 molecule were determined by SPR.
